question:
You recently bought a new Television online,However when it arrived you found that it had a problem.You called the customer services,but were not satisfied with the responce.
Write a letter to the company ,In your letter.
Introduce yourself
Explain the situation.
Explain what you want the company to do.
text: My name is Naomi Umami.  I am a regular and loyal customer of your online store. I am writing this letter to report the faulty TV that I purchased from your company on Tuesday last week.

The item was Sony's Aquos TV and I ordered it on 1st March 2022.  I received the product yesterday.  Unfortunately, I am quite disappointed with the product because it doesn't seem to turn on even after  I made sure the buttery is fully charged.  I made a phone call to your customer service and explained the situation, and they told me they will send someone to fix this problem within two days. However, I am disappointed to say that none of your staff has come to fix this.
I would like you to contact me as soon as possible. If I can not have the TV fixed by the end of this week, I would like to return the product and receive a refund for the amount for the purchase.
I look forward to hearing from you immediately.
